item.title: Unconventional Christmas Movies
item.description:
I like unconventional stories and I especially love a good movie that turns normal conventions on it’s head. I’ve separated this into two sections - my absolute favorites / go to holiday season movies, followed by other movies as we watch them. This will probably take me most of December to write so it will morph over time.

We already had a good start of our favorite unconventional Christmas movies and because it’s sort of our thing our friend Louise sent this list to us and we started watching even more!
